definition: people's organization (eg. labor unions, peasant associations, scholarly associations etc)/mass organization
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: Compassionate and disinterested groups of people.
sentences.chinese: 有同情心而且無私的人民團體。
